meanings.sent1: The nonactivated phone stayed silent all day.
meanings.sent2: The nonactivated alarm clock failed to wake me up.
meanings.sent3: The nonactivated flashlight was useless in the dark room.
meanings.sent4: Her nonactivated enthusiasm for the project was evident.
meanings.sent5: The nonactivated car sat idle in the garage.

meanings.sent1: The nonactivated account remained dormant for years.
meanings.sent2: The nonactivated security system did not provide any protection.
meanings.sent3: The nonactivated robot refused to do any work.
meanings.sent4: His nonactivated talent for painting was waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The nonactivated machine sat still, waiting for a command.
